name: Flappy Bird (itch) (Giampy)
description:
I think there is no need for a description HOW TO PLAY

Click on the screen, or use your spacebar to get started. Fly the bird as far as you can without hitting a pipe.

Credits

The game was made by @Giampy (Me lol)

Flappybird.ee for the Sfx and Game Assets 

Disclaimer

This is a clone of Flappy Bird, with some more features added. I am not affiliated with or endorsed by the original creator of Flappy Bird in any capacity. Feel free to do any type of content you want with the game, such as videos and posts.
